task_description: Users on Safari are reporting a bug where they are unable to log in. Issue is related to the recent JWT library update. Needs immediate attention as it impacts all new user sign-ups.
author: Zofia Wiśniewska

task_title: Draft Social Media Campaign for September Launch
task_description: Create a full content calendar and draft posts for Twitter and LinkedIn for the upcoming 'Project Phoenix' launch. Focus on key features and early-adopter benefits.
author: Piotr Zieliński

task_description: Review and update the company's employee handbook with the new remote work and benefits policies. Circulate draft to management for approval by end of Q4.
author: Ewa Jankowska

task_description: Compile sales data from all regions for the third quarter. Prepare a presentation deck highlighting key wins, losses, and performance against targets for the upcoming board meeting.
author: Tomasz Lewandowski

task_description: Develop a detailed project plan for migrating our legacy database servers to a new AWS RDS instance. Include timeline, risk assessment, and required resources.
author: Anna Nowak

task_title: Design UI Mockups for New Dashboard
task_description: Create high-fidelity mockups in Figma for the new user analytics dashboard. The design should incorporate the new branding guidelines and focus on data visualization.
author: Grzegorz Kubiak

task_title: Fix CSS Alignment on Homepage Footer
task_description: The social media icons in the website footer are misaligned on mobile viewports smaller than 375px. Adjust the flexbox properties to ensure proper alignment.
author: Jan Kowalski

task_title: Write Blog Post on Q3 Industry Trends
task_description: Author a 1,200-word blog post analyzing the key industry trends observed in Q3 2025. Include insights from our recent market research report. Target SEO keywords 'market trends 2025'.
author: Piotr Zieliński

task_description: Complete the full onboarding checklist for the new sales executive, including system access setup, initial training sessions, and introductions to key team members.
author: Ewa Jankowska

task_description: Users are reporting slow load times on the main application dashboard. Investigate potential database query inefficiencies or indexing problems. The issue is blocked pending log access from the DevOps team.
author: Zofia Wiśniewska
